short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab page with Backgrounds home page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension configures your New Tab page to YoJoTab to provide these features.

Customise your background with one of our many backgrounds, read latest news headlines, watch our video content and view our popular images site.

Please read carefully: By installing the extension, you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. The application communicates with our servers to deliver its functionality and record usage metrics. You can uninstall the program at any time.
End User License Agreement: http://yojotab.com/eula.php
 
Privacy Policy: http://yojotab.com/privacy.php
 
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the Extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
 
For instructions on how to remove our extension from Firefox or Internet Explorer, or for other support, please visit us at http://yojotab.com/uninstall.php.

For assistance from our customer service team, please email us at customer@yojotab.com
